text: "I Can't Tell You Why" is a 1980 song by Eagles and taken from their sixth studio album The Long Run. It went to number 5 in Canada, number 8 in the United States, number 11 in New Zealand and number 48 in the Netherlands. == Track listing == *7" single (45-1965/AS 12.418/K 12418/E-46608) *7" promo (E-46608) == References == Category:1980 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Blue-eyed soul songs Category:Eagles (band) songs Category:Vince Gill songs
title: I Can't Tell You Why
